member.name: T:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys
member.summary: Specifies the possible key values on a keyboard.

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys.XButton1
member.summary: The first x mouse button (five-button mouse).

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys.XButton2
member.summary: The second x mouse button (five-button mouse).

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys.HanguelMode
member.summary: The IME Hanguel mode key. (maintained for compatibility; use HangulMode)

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys.LWin
member.summary: The left Windows logo key (Microsoft Natural Keyboard).

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys.RWin
member.summary: The right Windows logo key (Microsoft Natural Keyboard).

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys.NumPad0
member.summary: The 0 key on the numeric keypad.

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys.NumPad1
member.summary: The 1 key on the numeric keypad.

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys.NumPad2
member.summary: The 2 key on the numeric keypad.

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys.NumPad3
member.summary: The 3 key on the numeric keypad.

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys.NumPad4
member.summary: The 4 key on the numeric keypad.

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys.NumPad5
member.summary: The 5 key on the numeric keypad.

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys.NumPad6
member.summary: The 6 key on the numeric keypad.

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys.NumPad7
member.summary: The 7 key on the numeric keypad.

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys.NumPad8
member.summary: The 8 key on the numeric keypad.

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys.NumPad9
member.summary: The 9 key on the numeric keypad.

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys.Packet
member.summary: Used to pass Unicode characters as if they were keystrokes. The Packet key value is the low word of a 32-bit virtual-key value used for non-keyboard input methods.

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys.NoName
member.summary: A constant reserved for future use.

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys.KeyCode
member.summary: The bitmask to extract a key code from a key value.

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys.Modifiers
member.summary: The bitmask to extract modifiers from a key value.

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys.ImeProcessed
member.summary: A special key masking the real key being processed by an IME.

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys.System
member.summary: A special key masking the real key being processed as a system key.

member.name: T:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.CommonResource
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.CommonResource.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.CommonResource.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeyInterop
member.summary: Provides static methods to convert between Win32 Virtual-Keys and the enumeration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeyInterop.KeyFromVirtualKey(System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts a Win32 Virtual-Key into an InputKeys.

member.name: M:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeyInterop.VirtualKeyFromKey(Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeys)
member.summary: Converts an InputKeys into a Win32 Virtual-Key.

member.name: T:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.ChineseImeAwareAutoCompleteListenerBase
member.summary: Implements the basic functionality required by class in WinForm or class in Wpf.

member.name: M:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.ChineseImeAwareAutoCompleteListenerBase.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.ChineseImeAwareAutoCompleteListenerBase.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes this instance. This method MUST be called in derived classes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.ChineseImeAwareAutoCompleteListenerBase.ContextManager
member.summary: Gets or sets the context manager.

member.name: P:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.ChineseImeAwareAutoCompleteListenerBase.IsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Ime-Aware AutoComplete feature is enabled.
member.value: true if this feature is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.ContextManager.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.ContextManager.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.IComparer{System.String})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with specified comparer.
member.param: true, the candidates will be sorted by specified comparer; otherwise, false.
The comparer that is used to sort candidates.

member.name: M:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.ContextManager.MatchPrefix(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a collection of candidates that match the specified prefix.
member.returns: The collection of candidates from candidate source. It's sorted by specified comparer if is true.

member.name: M:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.ContextManager.ClearAllItems
member.summary: Clears all items from the candidates source.

member.name: M:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.ContextManager.AddItem(System.String)
member.summary: Adds this item to the candidate source.
member.returns: true if item is successfully added; otherwise, false. This method also returns false if there is a duplicate.

member.name: M:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.ContextManager.RemoveItem(System.String)
member.summary: Removes this item from the candidate source.
member.returns: true if item is successfully removed; otherwise, false. This method also returns false if the item is not found.

member.name: P:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.ContextManager.SourceCandidates
member.summary: Gets the collection containing all candidates.

member.name: P:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.ContextManager.CurrentCandidates
member.summary: Gets the collection containing current candidates filtered by MatchPrefix.

member.name: P:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.ContextManager.IsSorted
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this candidate list is sorted. Ususally used for filter logic.
member.value: true if this candidate list is sorted; otherwise, false.The default value is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.ContextManager.Comparer
member.summary: Gets or sets the comparer used to sort candidates.
member.value: The comparer. The default value is a default comparer.

member.name: P:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.ContextManager.ItemCount
member.summary: Gets the number of items in the candidate source.
member.value: The number of items in the candidate source.

member.name: M:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeyConverter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputKeyConverter.ConvertFromString(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the specified text to an object.
member.param: The text representation of the object to convert.
member.returns: An InputKeys object that represents the converted text.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this is handled.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

A value indicating whether it's a continuous input key together with the previous one.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this event is from Ime.

member.name: P:Microsoft.International.ImeAwareAutoComplete.InputEventArgs.IsContinuous
